_header: Th’Apocalypse in English maketh here beginning
_description: Couplet introducing a Middle English prose version of Apocalypse

CamMagPep2498.Transcription:
Þapocalips on englissh makeþ here gynnyngAfter þis
                    synful lyf god graunt vs good wonyng
CamMagPep2498.Note: As introduction to Apocalypse in English.
CamMagPep2498.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             Bibliotheca Pepysiana: A Descriptive Catalogue of the Library of Samuel
                Pepys. Pt. III: Medieval Manuscripts.
         London, 1923: 3.107.
Påhlsson,  Joel,
                        ed.  
             The Recluse: a Fourteenth Century Version of the Ancren Riwle.
         Lund: Ohlsson, 1911: 1v.
